TopicTitle: Imperial Tahei Returns! New Galorian design/Rerelease of old ships [Image Heavy]

Articles.Content:
I am very proud to announce that Imperial Tahei - Massacred in the April event, intends to return to produce new ship designs, competition, and a great deal of hard work.

First i can announce an entirely new Galorian design, the Balseor, which is the biggest Galorian design i intend to release. The Kyyza'Kiriea and the Seleneikos returns as well.

Balseor Galorian

Gallery

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Overly Dramatic Presentation Video

And of course, the old Kyyza and the Seleneikos colonizer returns from the grave after having met their untimely demise.

Seleneikos Nuclear Colony Cruiser

Thank you for taking your time. It is much appreciated

Edited July 9, 2013 by Ascensiam
I was wondering when you would start making these amazing creations again, Are they armed?
Thank you for re-posting your ships Ascensiam, they're definitely amazing crafts, shame you didn't win the mothership challenge with the Seleneikos a while (long while) back.

I was wondering when you would start making these amazing creations again, Are they armed?

No, i am currently not making military ships, civilian ships tend to be bigger.

Thank you for re-posting your ships Ascensiam, they're definitely amazing crafts, shame you didn't win the mothership challenge with the Seleneikos a while (long while) back.

If i remember correctly, that was because i didn't apply, since moderators couldn't.
I have no words to describe how overwhelmed i am. I HAIL YOU LORD ASCENSIAM OF KSP!

YES YES YES! THANK YOU ASCENSCIAM WE LOVE YOU

I cannot wait to try this now that it won't murder my system.
Just as a reminder, the big vessels, those that are modular and could not be launched in one piece will be impossible to release, and persistence files would require the custom mod parts i use.
Ah my mistake then. Still, your craft make me want to get a new computer, well done again.
